III . To study association clinical ( toxicity and/or tumor response activity ) biologic ( pharmacodynamic ) result obtain examine tissue biopsy PET PET/CT image patient . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study sirolimus . Patients receive sirolimus orally ( PO ) daily ( QD ) vismodegib PO QD day 1-28 .
